help.title: Space Shuttle
help.text:
Start like a airplane: Set the Pilot to 0 Set the Tank 1 to 129000 Set the Tank 2 to 117000 now the shuttle will be in horizontal position, give a little throttle, and take off, be carefull with throttle - it is a rocket!
Start like the Shuttle: Set the Pilot to 0 Set the Tank 1 to 220000 Set the Tank 2 to full Set the Autopilot to Heading Control - Wing Leveler and Velocity Control to 500, by clicking the Velocity Contoll Start up!
Gears, Flaps and Speed Breaks are not animated but are there in the jsb.
To set the booster and tank go to the properties-browser, > contols > shuttle and set 1 to the tank and the boosters properties, befor landing or after reaching the orbit disable both of them by setting the properties to 0.
Have fun and take your time to get control, it is a little bit tricky but fully working, also with ILS and AP.
See the latest version on: www.github.com/HerbyW
